WITH PRE_STAGGING AS (
        SELECT DATE(O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW.project_id,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW.tower,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW.Level,
        'Fire Lift Lobby' AS sclicer,
        Column_Name.*,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP.SBU_ID,
        O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id
                            ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC
                            )     Project_Udate_DRANK
    FROM O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL (
                        SELECT    `MEP Marking for Builders Work`    ,    'MEP Marking for Builders Work'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork`    ,    'Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `MEP Services Installation`    ,    'MEP Services Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Wall MEP Services Packing`    ,    'Wall MEP Services Packing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Plaster`    ,    'Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Screed`    ,    'Screed'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Lift Door Installation & Jamb Installation`    ,    'Lift Door Installation & Jamb Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Beside Lift Door Blockwork`    ,    'Beside Lift Door Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Beside Lift Door Plaster`    ,    'Beside Lift Door Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `MEP High Level Works`    ,    'MEP High Level Works'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `FC Framing`    ,    'FC Framing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `MEP Boarding Clearance`    ,    'MEP Boarding Clearance'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `FC Boarding`    ,    'FC Boarding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Joint Taping and Sanding`    ,    'Joint Taping and Sanding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Ceiling Primer`    ,    'Ceiling Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Ceiling Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat`    ,    'Ceiling Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Ceiling First Coat Paint`    ,    'Ceiling First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Wall Primer`    ,    'Wall Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Wall Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat`    ,    'Wall Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Wall First Coat Paint`    ,    'Wall First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Floor Tile`    ,    'Floor Tile'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Door-Frame Installation`    ,    'Door-Frame Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Door-Architrave Installation`    ,    'Door-Architrave Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Door-Shutter Installation`    ,    'Door-Shutter Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Door-Ironmongery Installation`    ,    'Door-Ironmongery Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Door-Silicone`    ,    'Door-Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Epoxy Grinding`    ,    'Epoxy Grinding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Epoxy Bug Fill`    ,    'Epoxy Bug Fill'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Epoxy Primer`    ,    'Epoxy Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Epoxy First Coat`    ,    'Epoxy First Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Epoxy Final Coat`    ,    'Epoxy Final Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Skirting`    ,    'Skirting'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Grout`    ,    'Grout'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Silicone`    ,    'Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Signage`    ,    'Signage'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `MEP Final Fixtures`    ,    'MEP Final Fixtures'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    `Final Coat`    ,    'Final Coat'
                        )as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP 
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
    )
SELECT 
    PS.Upload_Date    ,
    PS.project_id    ,
    PS.tower    ,
    PS.`Level`    ,
    PS.sclicer    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN PS.value IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE PS.value
    END AS value,
    PS.Type_of_work    ,
    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    PS.SBU_ID    ,
    PS.CATEGORY    ,
    OLMA.level_map
FROM PRE_STAGGING PS
    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA
        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level`
WHERE PS.Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_servicerooms;
INSERT INTO f_pln_servicerooms
    WITH UNION_ALL AS (
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_WATERROOM
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_GARBAGEROOM
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY
    )
    SELECT 
        UNION_ALL.Upload_Date,    
        UNION_ALL.project_id,
        UNION_ALL.tower,
        UNION_ALL.`Level`,
        UNION_ALL.sclicer,
        CAST(REPLACE(UNION_ALL.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100 AS value,
        UNION_ALL.ACTIVITY_ID,
        UNION_ALL.SBU_ID,
        UNION_ALL.CATEGORY,
        CASE
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork' AND sclicer = 'Electrical Room' THEN 'Blockwork ER'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork Layout' AND sclicer = 'Electrical Room' THEN 'Blockwork Layout ER'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Bore Packing' AND sclicer = 'Electrical Room' THEN 'Bore Packing ER'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Floor Tile' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Floor Tile WMR'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'MEP Sleeve Installation' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'MEP Sleeve Installation WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Plaster' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Plaster WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'POP Works' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'POP Works WMR'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Skirting' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Skirting WMR'

            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Primer' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Wall Primer WMR'
            WHEN Type_of_work = 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)' AND sclicer = 'Water Meter Room' THEN 'Wall Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat) WMR'
             ELSE Type_of_work
        END AS Type_of_work,
        O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL.level_map,
        CASE        
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Blockwork') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Builders Work') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  16
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Plaster') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Screed') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Paint') THEN  8
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Gypsum') THEN  6
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Marble') THEN  10
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Tile') THEN  9
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Joinery') THEN  12
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Signage') THEN  7
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('SFD') THEN  15
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Epoxy') THEN  11
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist Services') THEN  13
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Waterproofing')THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(UNION_ALL.CATEGORY) IN('Specialist System')THEN  14
            ELSE 20
        END AS CATEGORY_MAP
    FROM UNION_ALL 
        LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL ON UNION_ALL.`Level` = O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL.`level`;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_procurement;
INSERT INTO f_pln_procurement
WITH MAIN_TABLE AS (
SELECT
    DATE(upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    SBU,
    Classification,
    Description,
    Category,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`    
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`PR_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `PR_Plan`
    END AS `PR_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`PR_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `PR_Actual`
    END AS `PR_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Plan`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Plan`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Actual`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Actual`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Actual`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Required at site by`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Required at site by`
    END AS `Required at site by`,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(`Actual delivery at site`) IN ('',"NA","-") THEN NULL 
        ELSE `Actual delivery at site`
    END AS `Actual delivery at site`,
    DENSE_RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY DATE(upload_time) DESC) DENSE_RANKER
FROM O_PLN_PROCUREMENT_RAW oppr),
REMOVE_NULLS AS (
    SELECT
    Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    SBU,
    Classification,
    Description,
    Category,
    CASE
     WHEN TRIM(`Issuance of Drawings_Plan`) IS NULL THEN `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`
     ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`
    END AS `Issuance of Drawings_Plan`,
    `Issuance of Drawings_Actual`,
     CASE
     WHEN TRIM(`PR_Plan`) IS NULL THEN PR_Actual
     ELSE `PR_Plan`
     END AS `PR_Plan`,
    PR_Actual,
    CASE
    WHEN TRIM(`Vendor Finalization_Plan`) IS NULL THEN `Vendor Finalization_Actual`
    ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`
    END AS `Vendor Finalization_Plan`,
    `Vendor Finalization_Actual`,
    CASE
    WHEN TRIM(`Required at site by`) IS NULL  THEN `Actual delivery at site`
    ELSE `Required at site by`
    END AS `Required at site by`,
    `Actual delivery at site` FROM MAIN_TABLE WHERE DENSE_RANKER = 1),
REMOVE_COMMENTS AS (
SELECT 
Upload_Date,
project_id,
tower,
sbu_id,
CASE 
    WHEN SBU IS NULL OR TRIM(SBU) IN ('') THEN 'Unknown'
    ELSE SBU
END AS SBU,
OSM.sbu_identifier,
Classification,
Description,
Category,
CASE WHEN `Issuance of Drawings_Plan` REGEXP ('Comp.|#VALUE!|Supply|Comp') then Upload_Date ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Plan` END AS `Issuance of Drawings Plan`,
CASE WHEN `Issuance of Drawings_Actual` REGEXP ('Comp.|complete|details to be finalized|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Issuance of Drawings_Actual` END AS `Issuance of Drawings Actual`,
CASE WHEN `PR_Plan` REGEXP ('Comp.|VALUE!|Supply|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `PR_Plan` END AS `PR Plan`,
CASE WHEN `PR_Actual` REGEXP ('Central store|Comp.|Comp|Target date 14.07.2022|NA, to be removed|complete') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `PR_Actual` END AS `PR Actual`,
CASE WHEN `Vendor Finalization_Plan` REGEXP ('Supply|Comp.|Comp|Supply|#VALUE!') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Plan`END AS `Vendor Finalization Plan`,
CASE WHEN `Vendor Finalization_Actual` REGEXP ('Central store|Comp.|Comp|complete' ) THEN  Upload_Date ELSE `Vendor Finalization_Actual` END AS `Vendor Finalization Actual`,
CASE WHEN `Required at site by` REGEXP ('As required|Comp.|#VALUE!|Comp') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Required at site by` END AS `Required at site by`,
CASE WHEN `Actual delivery at site` REGEXP ('As required|Comp.|Comp|complete') THEN Upload_Date ELSE `Actual delivery at site` END AS `Actual delivery at site`
FROM REMOVE_NULLS
LEFT JOIN O_SBU_MAPPING OSM ON REMOVE_NULLS.SBU = OSM.sbu_shorts) SELECT * FROM REMOVE_COMMENTS;

TRUNCATE TABLE aug_gaant_test;
INSERT INTO aug_gaant_test
WITH PRE_FORMAT_CHANGER AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(OPM.upload_time) AS Upload_Time,
        OPM.project_id,
        OPM.`Group`,
        OPM.`Activity Description`,
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.`Actual / Forecast Start` IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Start`) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.`Baseline Start`,'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Start`,'-','/')
        END AS `Actual Start Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.`Actual / Forecast Finish` IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Finish`) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.`Baseline Finish`,'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Finish`,'-','/')
        END `Actual Finish Date`,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY DATE(OPM.upload_time) DESC) DENSE_RANK_,
        OPM.`Actual %`
    FROM
        O_PLN_MILESTONE OPM 
        WHERE 
--     TRIM(OPM.`Activity Description`) NOT IN 
--         (
--             'Pile Cap',
--             'ACP Works',
--             'Lift - CTU',
--             'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
--             'Swimming Pool',
--             'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
--             'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Are',
--             'Changing Rooms / GYM',
--             'Wooden Decking',
--             'Transformer payment',
--             'LV Inspection & Approval',
--             'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
--             'Power on'
--         ) AND 
        (OPM.`Group` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Group`) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.`Activity Description` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Activity Description`) NOT IN ('')
--                 AND OPM.`Actual / Forecast Start` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Start`) NOT IN ('')
--                 AND OPM.`Actual / Forecast Finish` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Actual / Forecast Finish`) NOT IN ('')
                )
        ),
-- Again Making Small changes to the Date format
FORMAT_CHANGER AS (
    SELECT 
        FC.Upload_Time,
        FC.project_id,
        FC.`Group`,
        FC.`Activity Description`,
        CASE 
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Start Date` LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Start Date`,'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.`Actual Start Date`
        END `Actual Start Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.`Actual Finish Date` LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Actual Finish Date`,'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.`Actual Finish Date`
        END `Actual Finish Date`,
        FC.`Actual %`
    FROM PRE_FORMAT_CHANGER FC WHERE FC.DENSE_RANK_ = 1),
Format_Changer_Final AS (
    SELECT 
        FC.Upload_Time,
        FC.project_id,
        FC.`Group`,
        FC.`Activity Description`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Start Date`)) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Start Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE FC.`Actual Start Date`
        END AS `Actual Start Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Actual Finish Date`)) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Actual Finish Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE FC.`Actual Finish Date`
        END AS `Actual Finish Date`,
        FC.`Actual %`
    FROM FORMAT_CHANGER FC),
DATA_CORRECTOR AS (
    SELECT 
        FCF.Upload_Time,
        FCF.project_id,
        FCF.`Group`,
        FCF.`Activity Description`,
        STR_TO_DATE(FCF.`Actual Start Date`,'%d/%c/%Y') AS `Actual Start Date`,
        STR_TO_DATE(FCF.`Actual Finish Date`,'%d/%c/%Y') AS `Actual Finish Date`,
        FCF.`Actual %`
    FROM 
        Format_Changer_Final FCF),
-- Final Table Actuals Milestone
MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE AS (
    SELECT 
        DC.Upload_Time,
        DC.project_id,
        DC.`Group`,
        DC.`Activity Description`,
        DC.`Actual Start Date`,
        DC.`Actual Finish Date`,
        DATEDIFF(DC.`Actual Finish Date`, DC.`Actual Start Date`) AS Total_days,
        DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Actual Start Date`) AS Days_elapsed,
--         CASE
--             WHEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Actual Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Actual Finish Date`, DC.`Actual Start Date`)) < 1
--                 AND (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Actual Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Actual Finish Date`, DC.`Actual Start Date`)) > 0 
--                 THEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Actual Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Actual Finish Date`, DC.`Actual Start Date`))
--             WHEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Actual Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Actual Finish Date`, DC.`Actual Start Date`)) < 0 THEN 0
--                 ELSE 1
--             END AS Completion_plan,
        CASE
--             For Manual Entry
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN (
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking'
                                                                                    )  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
--         For Structures
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'F_PLN_STRUCTURES'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
--         For Dry Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
--         For Wet Area    
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'F_PLN_WETAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'F_PLN_WETAREA'
--         For Corridor Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'F_PLN_CORRIDOR'
--         For Balcony Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'F_PLN_BALCONYAREA'
--         For Kitchen Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA'
--         For KeepOut Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Keepout' THEN 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT'
--         Yet to be Decided
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN (
                                                                                    'Kitchen Appliances',
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
            ELSE 'MISSING'
        END AS Source_Templet,
        OLMP.Sort_Group,
        OLMP.Sort_Activity,
        OLMP.Activity_New,
        P.FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.`Actual %`
        FROM DATA_CORRECTOR DC 
            LEFT JOIN O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP OLMP
                ON DC.`Group` = OLMP.`Group` 
                AND DC.`Activity Description` = OLMP.Activity
            LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P
                ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier),
#######################################################################################################################################
ACTUALS_COLLECTOR AS (
-- Clear the data and make it easy to read
    WITH DRY_AREA_RAW AS (
        SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.`Level`,
            FPD.Flat,
            FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM F_PLN_DRYAREA FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Plaster',
                                        'Screed',
                                        'Floor Tile',
                                        'FC Framing',
                                        'FC Boarding with Joint Taping',
                                        'Floor Tiling'
                                        )
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    DRY_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (
        SELECT 
            DAR.project_id,
            DAR.Type_of_work,
            DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY DAR.project_id ORDER BY DAR.tower) AS RANKER,
            SUM(DAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
        FROM DRY_AREA_RAW DAR 
        GROUP BY 1,2,DAR.tower),
    DRYAREA_GAANT_FINAL AS (
        SELECT 
            DAA.project_id,
            DAA.Type_of_work,
            DAA.SUM_ALL,
            'F_PLN_DRYAREA' AS Source_Table
        FROM DRY_AREA_AGGREGATOR DAA),
    WET_AREA_RAW AS (
            SELECT 
                WPD.project_id,
                WPD.tower,
                WPD.`Level`,
                WPD.Flat,
                WPD.sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(WPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                WPD.Type_of_work,
                WPD.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM F_PLN_WETAREA WPD 
            WHERE
                LOWER(WPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Wet Area Screed',
                                            'Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance',
                                            'Wall tile bottom Tile',
                                            'Wet Area FC Framing',
                                            'FC Boarding & Joint Taping',
                                            'Floor Tile',
                                            'Wet Area Final Fixtures Installation',
                                            'Vanity Cabinet'
                                            )
                AND (WPD.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '9%'
                    ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    WET_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (
            SELECT 
                WAR.project_id,
                WAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(WAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM WET_AREA_RAW WAR 
            GROUP BY 1,2),
    WETAREA_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT 
                WAA.project_id,
                WAA.Type_of_work,
                WAA.SUM_ALL,
                'F_PLN_WETAREA' AS Source_Table
            FROM WET_AREA_AGGREGATOR WAA),
    CORRIDOR_AREA_RAW AS (
        SELECT 
            FPC.project_id,

                OR FPC.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '6%'

    CORRIDOR_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (

                CAR.Type_of_work,

    CORRIDOR_GAANT_FINAL AS (

    KITCHEN_AREA_RAW AS (

                LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (

                AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'

                    OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'

                    OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'

    KITCHEN_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (

    KITCHEN_GAANT_FINAL AS (

    BALCONY_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (

    BALCONY_GAANT_FINAL AS (

                KAA.Type_of_work,
                KAA.SUM_ALL,

    SLIDINGDOOR_RAW AS (
        SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,

                                        'Sliding Door External Silicone'

            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'

                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    SLIDINGDOOR_AGGREGATOR AS (
            SELECT 
                SDR.project_id,
                SDR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM SLIDINGDOOR_RAW SDR 
            GROUP BY 1,2),
    SLIDINGDOOR_GAANT_STAGGING AS (
            SELECT 
                SDA.project_id,
                SDA.Type_of_work,
                SDA.SUM_ALL,
                CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Box Installation'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Frame Installation'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Glass Installation'     THEN 0.45
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Internal Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Alignment'             THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door External Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                'F_PLN_DRYAREA' AS Source_Table
            FROM SLIDINGDOOR_AGGREGATOR SDA),
    SLIDINGDOOR_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT 
                SGS.project_id,
                'Sliding Door' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                SGS.Source_Table
            FROM SLIDINGDOOR_GAANT_STAGGING SGS
            GROUP BY 1
            ),
    KITCHEN_CABINET_RAW AS (

            AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'

                OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'

    KITCHEN_CABINET_AGGREGATOR AS (

                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM KITCHEN_CABINET_RAW SDR

    KITCHEN_CABINET_GAANT_STAGGING AS (

                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet'                 THEN 0.5
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Plywood'         THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting'         THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'         THEN 0.05
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA' AS Source_Table
            FROM KITCHEN_CABINET_AGGREGATOR SDA),
    KITCHEN_CABINET_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT

                'Kitchen Cabinet' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                SGS.Source_Table
            FROM KITCHEN_CABINET_GAANT_STAGGING SGS
            GROUP BY 1
            ),
    KEEPOUT_AREA_RAW AS (
            SELECT 
                FPK.project_id,
                FPK.tower,
                FPK.`Level`,
                FPK.Flat,
                'Keep Out' AS sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(FPK.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                FPK.Type_of_work,
                FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM F_PLN_KEEPOUT FPK 
            WHERE
                LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)',
                                            'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)',
                                            'Keep Out (QT)'
                                            )
                AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                    ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    KEEPOUT_AREA_AGGREGATOR AS (
            SELECT 
                KAR.project_id,
                KAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(KAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM KEEPOUT_AREA_RAW KAR 
            GROUP BY 1,2),
    KEEPOUT_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT 
                KAA.project_id,
                KAA.Type_of_work,
                (KAA.SUM_ALL*100) AS SUM_ALL,
                'F_PLN_KEEPOUT' AS Source_Table
            FROM KEEPOUT_AREA_AGGREGATOR KAA),
    BLOCKWORK_RAW AS (
        SELECT 
            FPD.project_id,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.`Level`,
            FPD.Flat,
            FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM F_PLN_DRYAREA FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Blockwork First Layer'
                                        'Blockwork'
                                        'GI Lintel'
                                        'Above Lintel Block Work'
                                        )
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    BLOCKWORK_AGGREGATOR AS (
            SELECT 
                BWR.project_id,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM BLOCKWORK_RAW BWR 
            GROUP BY 1,2),
    BLOCKWORK_GAANT_STAGGING AS (
            SELECT 
                BWA.project_id,
                BWA.Type_of_work,
                BWA.SUM_ALL,
                CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork First Layer'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork'                 THEN 0.4
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'GI Lintel'                 THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Above Lintel Block Work'     THEN 0.3
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                'F_PLN_DRYAREA' AS Source_Table
            FROM BLOCKWORK_AGGREGATOR BWA),
    BLOCKWORK_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT 
                BGS.project_id,
                'Blockwork' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                BGS.Source_Table
            FROM BLOCKWORK_GAANT_STAGGING BGS
            GROUP BY 1
            ),
    BALUSTRADE_WORKS_RAW AS (
        SELECT 
            FPB.project_id,
            FPB.tower,
            FPB.`Level`,
            FPB.Flat,
            FPB.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPB.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPB.Type_of_work,
            FPB.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM F_PLN_BALCONYAREA FPB 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPB.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'F channel Installation',
                                        'Top Rail Bracket Installation',
                                        'Balustrade Glass Installation',
                                        'Balustrade Top Rail',
                                        'Balustrade-Internal Flashing'
                                        )
            AND (FPB.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPB.value LIKE '9%'
                ) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 ORDER BY 1,2),
    BALUSTRADE_WORKS_AGGREGATOR AS (
            SELECT 
                BWR.project_id,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL
            FROM BALUSTRADE_WORKS_RAW BWR 
            GROUP BY 1,2),
    BALUSTRADE_WORKS_GAANT_STAGGING AS (
            SELECT 
                BWA.project_id,
                BWA.Type_of_work,
                BWA.SUM_ALL,
                CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'F channel Installation'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Top Rail Bracket Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Glass Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Top Rail'                 THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade-Internal Flashing'        THEN 0.2
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                'F_PLN_DRYAREA' AS Source_Table
            FROM BALUSTRADE_WORKS_AGGREGATOR BWA),
    BALUSTRADE_WORKS_GAANT_FINAL AS (
            SELECT 
                BGS.project_id,
                'Balustrade Works' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                BGS.Source_Table
            FROM BALUSTRADE_WORKS_GAANT_STAGGING BGS
            GROUP BY 1
            ),
-- Structures , The Biggest headache till now 
    GRADE_SLAB_COUNT AS (
        SELECT     
            P.Project_Identifier,
            COUNT(*) AS GS_Count
        FROM O_PLN_STRUCTURES_POUR_MAP OSPM 
            LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P 
            ON OSPM.project_id  = P.Project_Identifier
        WHERE LOWER(OSPM.type_of_pour) LIKE 'slab%' 
        GROUP BY 1
        ),
   # Divide By 0
   GRADE_SLAB_FINAL AS (
        SELECT 
            GSCU.*,
            'Grade Slab' AS Area,
            GSCM.GS_COMPLETED,
            CASE WHEN GS_Count=0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST((GSCM.GS_COMPLETED/GS_Count) AS DECIMAL(3,2)) END AS Actuals
        FROM GRADE_SLAB_COUNT GSCU 
            LEFT JOIN (    SELECT 
                            FPS.Project_Identifier,
                            COUNT(FPS.`Level`) AS GS_COMPLETED
                        FROM F_PLN_STRUCTURES FPS
                        WHERE LOWER(FPS.`Level`) LIKE '%grade slab%' 
                            AND value IS NOT NULL 
                        GROUP BY 1) AS GSCM 
                ON GSCU.Project_Identifier = GSCM.Project_Identifier),
    ACTUALS_OTHER_SLABS AS (
        SELECT 
            FPS.Project_Identifier,
            OPTPM.Area ,
            COUNT(FPS.Pour) Total_Completed 
        FROM F_PLN_STRUCTURES  FPS
            LEFT JOIN O_PLN_TOWER_PODIUM_MAP OPTPM
                ON FPS.Project_Identifier = OPTPM.Project 
                AND FPS.`Level` = OPTPM.`Level` 
--         WHERE FPS.Project_Identifier = 'Sobha Waves' 
--             AND FPS.Pour LIKE 'slab%'
        WHERE FPS.Pour LIKE 'slab%'
            AND LOWER(TRIM(FPS.`Level`))!= 'grade slab'
        GROUP BY 1,2
        ##ORDER BY level_map
        ),
    PIVOTING_TABLE AS (
        SELECT *,
            (Total_Podiums*Podium_Slab) AS PODIUM_COUNT,
            (Total_Typical_Floor*Typical_Floor_Slab) AS TYPICAL_FLOOR_COUNT
        FROM PROJECTS),
    COUNT_VALUE AS (
        SELECT 
            Project_Identifier,
            Virtual_table.*
        FROM PIVOTING_TABLE 
            CROSS JOIN LATERAL ( 
                        SELECT 'Podium',PODIUM_COUNT 
                    UNION ALL SELECT 'Typical Floor',TYPICAL_FLOOR_COUNT 
                                ) AS Virtual_table(Area,Value)
        WHERE Value IS NOT NULL),
    # Divide By 0
    OTHER_SLABS_FINAL AS (
    SELECT 
        CV.*,
        A.Total_Completed,
        CASE WHEN CV.Value=0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST((A.Total_Completed/CV.Value) AS DECIMAL(4,2)) END AS Actuals
    FROM COUNT_VALUE CV
    LEFT JOIN ACTUALS_OTHER_SLABS A ON CV.Project_Identifier = A.Project_Identifier
                        AND CV.Area = A.Area),
    STRUCTURE_UNION_ALL AS (
        SELECT 
            Project_Identifier AS project_id,
            Area AS Type_of_work,
            Actuals AS SUM_ALL,
            'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' AS Source_Table
        FROM GRADE_SLAB_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 
            Project_Identifier AS project_id,
            Area AS Type_of_work,
            Actuals AS SUM_ALL,
            'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' AS Source_Table
        FROM OTHER_SLABS_FINAL),
    STRUCTURE_GAANT_FINAL AS (
        SELECT 
            SGF.project_id,
            SGF.Type_of_work,
            (SGF.SUM_ALL*P.FLAT_COUNT)*100 AS SUM_ALL,
            SGF.Source_Table
        FROM STRUCTURE_UNION_ALL SGF 
            LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P 
                ON SGF.project_id = P.Project_Identifier),
     # Divide By 0
    ALL_AREA_TEMPLET AS (
        SELECT * FROM DRYAREA_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM WETAREA_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM CORRIDOR_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM KITCHEN_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM BALCONY_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL 
        SELECT * FROM SLIDINGDOOR_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM KITCHEN_CABINET_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM KEEPOUT_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM BLOCKWORK_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM BALUSTRADE_WORKS_GAANT_FINAL
        UNION ALL 
        SELECT * FROM STRUCTURE_GAANT_FINAL)
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE
            -- Converting Template Headers to Milestone Templetes
-- For Corridor Area
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Floor Tile'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_CORRIDOR' THEN 'Floor Tiles'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wall Tile'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_CORRIDOR' THEN 'Wall Tiles'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'FC Boarding'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_CORRIDOR' THEN 'False Ceiling - Boarding'
-- For Dry Area
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Plaster'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Plaster'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Screed'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Screed'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Floor Tiling'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Floor Tiles'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'FC Framing'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'False Ceiling - Framing'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'FC Boarding with Joint Taping'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'False Ceiling - Boarding'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Kitchen Cabinet'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA' THEN 'Kitchen Cabinet'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Kitchen Appliances'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA' THEN 'Kitchen Appliances'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Sliding Door'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Sliding Door'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Blockwork'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Blockwork'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Balustrade Works'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_DRYAREA' THEN 'Balustrade Works'
-- For Wet Area
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wet Area Screed'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'Screed'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'MEP High Lvl'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wall tile bottom Tile'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'Wall Tiles'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wet Area FC Framing'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'False Ceiling - Framing'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'FC Boarding & Joint Taping'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'False Ceiling - Boarding'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Floor Tile'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'Floor Tiles'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Wet Area Final Fixtures Installation'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'MEP Final Fix'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Vanity Cabinet'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_WETAREA' THEN 'Vanity Cabinet'
-- For Balcony Area
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'EIFS Installation'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_BALCONYAREA' THEN 'EIFS'
-- For Keep Out
-- Need to change this once we have the approval frm SAI
--             WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
--                 AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT' THEN 'CAP^Q Common Area QT Inspections'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Keep Out (QT)'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT' THEN 'CAP^Q Unit QT Keep-out approvals'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT' THEN 'CAP^Q (Stamp - I9) Kitchen Keep-'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT' THEN 'CAP^Q (Stamp - L9) Bathroom Keep'
-- For Structures
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Podium'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' THEN 'Podium Slabs'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Grade Slab'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' THEN 'Grade Slab'
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(AAT.Type_of_work)) = 'Typical Floor'
                AND `Source_Table` = 'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' THEN 'Typical Floor Slabs'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Milestone_Activity_Map
    FROM ALL_AREA_TEMPLET AAT),
OUTPUT_Plan AS (
    SELECT 
        MMT.Upload_Time AS Upload_Date,
        MMT.project_id,
        MMT.`Group`,
        MMT.`Activity Description`,
        MMT.Activity_New,
--         AC.Milestone_Activity_Map,
        CASE WHEN MMT.FLAT_COUNT=0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST((AC.SUM_ALL/MMT.FLAT_COUNT) AS DECIMAL(12,4)) END AS  Actual_Achived,
        MMT.`Actual Start Date`,
        MMT.`Actual Finish Date`,
        MMT.Total_days,
        MMT.Days_elapsed,
--         MMT.Completion_plan,
        MMT.Source_Templet,
        AC.Source_Table,
        MMT.Sort_Group,
        MMT.Sort_Activity,
        MMT.`Actual %`
--         MMT.FLAT_COUNT
    --     AC.project_id,
    --     AC.Type_of_work,
    --     AC.SUM_ALL,
    --     AC.Source_Table,
--         AC.Milestone_Activity_Map,
--         CAST((AC.SUM_ALL/MMT.FLAT_COUNT)/100 AS DECIMAL(12,4)) AS  Actual_Achived
    FROM MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE MMT
        LEFT JOIN ACTUALS_COLLECTOR AC
            ON MMT.project_id = AC.project_id
            AND MMT.`Activity Description` = AC.Milestone_Activity_Map
            AND MMT.Source_Templet = AC.Source_Table),
-- Additionally Added the Actuals Value Above
################################# Actual Calculation Completed ##############################################################
PRE_FORMAT_CHANGER_Plan AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(OPM.upload_time) AS Upload_Time,
        OPM.project_id,
        OPM.`Group`,
        OPM.`Activity Description`,
        REPLACE(OPM.`Baseline Start`,'-','/') AS `Baseline Start Date`,
        REPLACE(OPM.`Baseline Finish`,'-','/') AS `Baseline Finish Date`,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY DATE(OPM.upload_time) DESC) DENSE_RANK_,
        OPM.`Actual %`
    FROM
        O_PLN_MILESTONE OPM
        WHERE 
--         TRIM(OPM.`Activity Description`) NOT IN 
--         (
--             'Pile Cap',
--             'ACP Works',
--             'Lift - CTU',
--             'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
--             'Swimming Pool',
--             'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
--             'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Are',
--             'Changing Rooms / GYM',
--             'Wooden Decking',
--             'Transformer payment',
--             'LV Inspection & Approval',
--             'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
--             'Power on'
--         ) AND 
        (OPM.`Group` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Group`) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.`Activity Description` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Activity Description`) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.`Baseline Start` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Baseline Start`) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.`Baseline Finish` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.`Baseline Finish`) NOT IN ('')
                )
        ),
FORMAT_CHANGER_Plan AS (
    SELECT 
        FC.Upload_Time,
        FC.project_id,
        FC.`Group`,
        FC.`Activity Description`,
        CASE 
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Start Date` LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Start Date`,'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.`Baseline Start Date`
        END `Baseline Start Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.`Baseline Finish Date` LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`,'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.`Baseline Finish Date`
        END `Baseline Finish Date`,
        FC.`Actual %`
    FROM PRE_FORMAT_CHANGER_Plan FC WHERE FC.DENSE_RANK_ = 1),
Format_Changer_Final_Plan AS (
    SELECT 
        FC.Upload_Time,
        FC.project_id,
        FC.`Group`,
        FC.`Activity Description`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Start Date`)) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Start Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE FC.`Baseline Start Date`
        END AS `Baseline Start Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(TRIM(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`)) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(FC.`Baseline Finish Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE FC.`Baseline Finish Date`
        END AS `Baseline Finish Date`,
        FC.`Actual %`
    FROM FORMAT_CHANGER_Plan FC),
DATA_CORRECTOR_Plan AS (
    SELECT 
        FCF.Upload_Time,
        FCF.project_id,
        FCF.`Group`,
        FCF.`Activity Description`,
        STR_TO_DATE(FCF.`Baseline Start Date`,'%d/%c/%Y') AS `Baseline Start Date`,
        STR_TO_DATE(FCF.`Baseline Finish Date`,'%d/%c/%Y') AS `Baseline Finish Date`,
        FCF.`Actual %`
    FROM 
        Format_Changer_Final_Plan FCF),
 # Divide By 0
MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE_Plan AS (
    SELECT 
        DC.Upload_Time,
        DC.project_id,
        DC.`Group`,
        DC.`Activity Description`,
        DC.`Baseline Start Date`,
        DC.`Baseline Finish Date`,
        DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`) AS Total_days,
        DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Baseline Start Date`) AS Days_elapsed,
        CASE
			WHEN DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`) =0 THEN NULL
            WHEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Baseline Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`)) < 1
                AND (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Baseline Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`)) > 0 
                THEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Baseline Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`))
            WHEN (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DC.`Baseline Start Date`)/ DATEDIFF(DC.`Baseline Finish Date`, DC.`Baseline Start Date`)) < 0 THEN 0
                ELSE 1
            END AS Completion_plan,
        CASE
--             For Manual Entry
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN (
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking'
                                                                                    )  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
--         For Structures
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'F_PLN_STRUCTURES'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Structural Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
--         For Dry Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'F_PLN_DRYAREA'
--         For Wet Area    
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'F_PLN_WETAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'F_PLN_WETAREA'
--         For Corridor Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'F_PLN_CORRIDOR'
--         For Balcony Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'F_PLN_BALCONYAREA'
--         For Kitchen Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'F_PLN_KITCHENAREA'
--         For KeepOut Area
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Keepout' THEN 'F_PLN_KEEPOUT'
--         Yet to be Decided
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ( 
                                                                                    'Transformer payment',
                                                                                    'LV Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'BCC - Inspection & Approval',
                                                                                    'Power on'
                                                                                    ) THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'External Elevation' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN (
                                                                                    'Kitchen Appliances',
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.`Group` = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.`Activity Description` NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
            ELSE 'MISSING'
        END AS Source_Templet,
        OLMP.Sort_Group,
        OLMP.Sort_Activity,
        OLMP.Activity_New,
        P.FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.`Actual %`
        FROM DATA_CORRECTOR_Plan DC 
            LEFT JOIN O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP OLMP
                ON DC.`Group` = OLMP.`Group` 
                AND DC.`Activity Description` = OLMP.Activity
            LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P
                ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier),
Union_All_Final AS (
    SELECT 
        *,
        'Actuals' AS Legend
    FROM OUTPUT_Plan
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT 
        Upload_Time,
        project_id,
        `Group`,
        `Activity Description`,
        Activity_New,
--         Completion_plan*100 AS Actual_Achived,
        Completion_plan AS Actual_Achived,
        `Baseline Start Date`  AS     `Actual Start Date`,
        `Baseline Finish Date` AS    `Actual Finish Date`,
        Total_days,
        Days_elapsed,
        Source_Templet,
        Source_Templet AS Source_Table,
        Sort_Group,
        Sort_Activity,
        `Actual %`,
        'Plan' AS Legend
    FROM MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE_Plan),
CORRECTOR_Manual_Actuals AS (
SELECT 
    DATE(upload_time) AS Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
    Description,
    CASE 
        WHEN `% Actuals` IS NULL OR TRIM(`% Actuals`) IN ('') THEN 0
        ELSE IFNULL(CAST(REPLACE(`% Actuals`,'%','') AS DECIMAL),0.00)/100 
    END AS `% Actuals`,
    DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY DATE(upload_time) DESC) AS Dense_Ranker
FROM F_PLN_MILESTONE_MANUAL),
Manual_Actuals AS (
    SELECT 
         Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        Description,
        `% Actuals`,
        'Actuals' AS Legend,
        OPMP.*
    FROM CORRECTOR_Manual_Actuals C1
    LEFT JOIN O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP OPMP ON C1.Description = OPMP.`Activity`
    WHERE Dense_Ranker = 1 ORDER BY 1,2,3,4),
Manual_Actual_Merge AS (
    SELECT 
        UAF.Upload_Date,
        UAF.project_id,
        UAF.`Group`,
        UAF.`Activity Description`,
        UAF.Activity_New,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(UAF.Activity_New) IN ('BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on','LV Inspection & Approval',
                                        'Wooden Decking','ACP Works','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                        'Swimming Pool','Changing Rooms / GYM','Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                        'Lift - CTU','Pile Cap','Transformer payment','Pile')
                    AND UAF.Legend = 'Actuals' THEN MD.`% Actuals` 
            ELSE UAF.Actual_Achived
        END AS Actual_Achived,
        UAF.`Actual Start Date`,
        UAF.`Actual Finish Date`,
        UAF.Total_days,
        UAF.Days_elapsed,
        UAF.Source_Templet,
        UAF.Source_Table,
        UAF.Sort_Group,
        UAF.Sort_Activity,
        UAF.Legend,
        UAF.`Actual %`
    FROM Union_All_Final UAF 
    LEFT JOIN Manual_Actuals MD 
    ON UAF.Activity_New = MD.Activity_New
    AND UAF.project_id  = MD.project_id
    AND UAF.Legend  = MD.Legend
    ),
Final_OutPut AS (
    SELECT 
        Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        `Group`,
        `Activity Description`,
        Activity_New,
        Actual_Achived AS Original_Actuals,
        CASE 
            WHEN IFNULL(Actual_Achived,0) >1 THEN 1
            ELSE IFNULL(Actual_Achived,0)
        END AS     Actual_Achived,
        `Actual Start Date`,
        `Actual Finish Date`,
        Total_days,
        Days_elapsed,
        Source_Templet,
        Source_Table,
        Sort_Group,
        Sort_Activity,
        Legend,
        `Actual %`
    FROM Manual_Actual_Merge),
AUG_GAANT_TEST AS (
    SELECT 
    --     project_id,
    --     `Group`,
    --     `Activity Description`,
    --     Activity_New,Source_Templet,Source_Table,Legend,
        *,
        CONCAT(Legend,' : ',CAST(Actual_Achived*100 AS DECIMAL),'%') AS PLN_ACT
    FROM Final_OutPut WHERE Activity_New IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Activity_New),
AA AS (
SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity+0.1 AS Sort_Activity,
    `Group`,
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Actuals' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (A)') AS NEW_ACT  FROM O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP opmm 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity,
    `Group`,
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Plan' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (P)') AS NEW_ACT  FROM O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP opmm),
SEPT_GAANT_TEST AS (
SELECT 
    AGT.Upload_Date,
    AGT.project_id,
    AGT.`Group`,
    AGT.Sort_Group as Sort_Grp,
--     AGT.`Activity Description`,
    AGT.Activity_New,
    AA.NEW_ACT AS `Activity Description`,
    AA.Sort_Activity,
    AGT.Original_Actuals,
    AGT.Actual_Achived,
    AGT.`Actual Start Date`,
    AGT.`Actual Finish Date`,
--     AGT.Total_days,
--     AGT.Days_elapsed,
--     AGT.Source_Templet,
--     AGT.Source_Table,
    AGT.Legend,
    AGT.`Actual %`,
    AGT.PLN_ACT
FROM AUG_GAANT_TEST AGT
LEFT JOIN AA     ON AGT.Legend = AA.Legend
                AND AGT.Activity_New = AA.Activity_New
                AND AGT.`Activity Description` = AA.Activity
                AND AGT.`Group` = AA.`Group`
--  WHERE AGT.project_id = 'Sobha Waves Grande'
ORDER BY 2,AGT.Sort_Group,AA.Sort_Activity),
Manual_Addition_To_Code AS (
    SELECT 
        Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        `Group`,
        Sort_Grp,
        Activity_New,
        `Activity Description`,
        Sort_Activity,
        `Actual Start Date`,
        `Actual Finish Date`,
        Original_Actuals,
        Actual_Achived,
        CASE 
            WHEN `Actual %` IS NULL OR TRIM(`Actual %`) IN ('') THEN 0
            ELSE CAST(REPLACE(`Actual %`,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100
        END AS Manual_Values,    
        Legend,
        PLN_ACT
    FROM SEPT_GAANT_TEST agt),
Final_Final AS (
SELECT 
    Upload_Date,
    project_id,
    `Group`,
    Sort_Grp,
    Activity_New,
    `Activity Description`,
    Sort_Activity,
    `Actual Start Date`,
    `Actual Finish Date`,
    Original_Actuals,
--     Actual_Achived,
    CASE 
        WHEN Actual_Achived <= Manual_Values AND Legend = 'Actuals' THEN Manual_Values
        ELSE Actual_Achived
    END AS Actual_Achived,    
--     Manual_Values,
    Legend
FROM Manual_Addition_To_Code) 
SELECT *,
    CONCAT(Legend,' : ',CAST(Actual_Achived*100 AS DECIMAL),'%') AS PLN_ACT  FROM Final_Final;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_criticalissue_tracker;
INSERT INTO f_pln_criticalissue_tracker
WITH CRITICAL_CLEANING AS (
SELECT
            DATE(OPCIT.upload_time) AS `Upload Time`,
            OPCIT.`Reference Number`,
            OPCIT.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`,
            OPCIT.`Raised On`,
            CASE
                WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 1%' THEN 'SBU 1'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 2%' THEN 'SBU 2'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 3%' THEN 'SBU 3'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 4%' THEN 'SBU 4'
        WHEN OPCIT.`SBU (Issue Raised by)` LIKE '%SBU 5%' THEN 'SBU 5'
        ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
    END AS SBU_SCLICER,
            CASE
                WHEN OPCIT.`Pending With` IS NULL
        OR TRIM(OPCIT.`Pending With`) = '' THEN 'Not Available'
        ELSE OPCIT.`Pending With`
    END AS `Pending With`,
            OPCIT.`Issue Description`,
            OPCIT.`Current Status`,
            OPCIT.`Impact On`,
            OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`,
            OPCIT.`Status`,
            OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`,
            OPCIT.`Project`,
            PROJECTS.Project_Identifier
FROM
        O_PLN_CRITICAL_ISSUE_TRACKER OPCIT
    LEFT JOIN PROJECTS ON
        OPCIT.Project = PROJECTS.Project_Short
WHERE
        TRIM(OPCIT.`Issue Description`) NOT IN ('')),
APPLYING_RANK AS (
SELECT
        *,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CRITICAL_CLEANING.SBU_SCLICER
ORDER BY
        CRITICAL_CLEANING.`Upload Time` DESC) AS DENSER_RANK
FROM
        CRITICAL_CLEANING
ORDER BY
        2
),
STAGGING AS (
SELECT
        OPCIT.`Upload Time`,
        OPCIT.`Reference Number`,
        OPCIT.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Raised On`),'dec','12') 
            ELSE OPCIT.`Raised On`
        END AS `Raised On`,
        OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER,
        CASE 
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 1' THEN 1
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 2' THEN 2
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 3' THEN 3
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 4' THEN 4
            WHEN OPCIT.SBU_SCLICER = 'SBU 5' THEN 5
            ELSE 6
        END AS SBU_SORT,        
        OPCIT.`Pending With`,
        OPCIT.`Issue Description`,
        OPCIT.`Current Status`,
        OPCIT.`Impact On`,
        CASE
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE OPCIT.`Target Closure Date`
        END AS `Target Closure Date`,
        OPCIT.Status,
        CASE 
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jan%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jan','01')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%feb%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'feb','02')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%mar%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'mar','03')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%apr%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'apr','04')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%may%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'may','05')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jun%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jun','06')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%jul%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'jul','07')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%aug%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'aug','08')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%sep%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'sep','09')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%oct%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'oct','10')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%nov%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'nov','11')
            WHEN LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`) LIKE '%dec%' THEN REPLACE(LOWER(OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`),'dec','12')
            ELSE OPCIT.`Actual Closure Date`    
        END AS `Actual Closure Date`,
        OPCIT.Project,
        OPCIT.Project_Identifier
FROM
        APPLYING_RANK OPCIT 
WHERE
        DENSER_RANK = 1),
STAGGING2 AS ( 
    SELECT     
        ST.`Upload Time`,
        ST.`Reference Number`,
        ST.`PR / PO / Other Ref No`, 
        ST.SBU_SCLICER,
        ST.SBU_SORT,
        ST.`Pending With`,
        ST.`Issue Description`,
        ST.`Current Status`,
        ST.`Impact On`,
        ST.Status,
        ST.Project,
        ST.Project_Identifier,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Raised On` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Raised On`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Raised On`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Raised On`,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Actual Closure Date` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Actual Closure Date`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Actual Closure Date`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Actual Closure Date`,
        CASE 
            WHEN ST.`Target Closure Date` IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ST.`Target Closure Date`) NOT IN ('','-')  THEN STR_TO_DATE(ST.`Target Closure Date`,'%d-%c-%y') 
            ELSE NULL 
        END AS `Target Closure Date`
    FROM STAGGING ST),
FINAL_OUTPUT AS (
    SELECT 
        ST2.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(LOWER(ST2.Status)) = 'open' THEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(),DATE(ST2.`Raised On`))
            WHEN TRIM(LOWER(ST2.Status)) = 'closed' AND ST2.`Actual Closure Date` IS NOT NULL THEN  DATEDIFF(ST2.`Actual Closure Date`,ST2.`Raised On`)
        ELSE NULL 
    END AS Ageing        
    FROM STAGGING2 ST2)
    SELECT 
        FO.*,
        CASE 
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=7  THEN  '(0-7)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 14 THEN '(8-14)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 21 THEN '(15-21)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing <= 30 THEN '(22-30)'
            WHEN FO.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
            ELSE '>30'
        END AS Agetub,
        CASE 
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=7  THEN 1
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=14 THEN 2
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=21 THEN 3
            WHEN FO.Ageing <=30 THEN 4
            WHEN FO.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
            ELSE 5
        END AS Agetub_sort        
    FROM FINAL_OUTPUT FO ;

    SELECT 1;
